'Heather Reisman' (born August 28, 1948) is a Canadian businesswoman. Reisman is
the founder and chief executive of the Canadian retail chain Indigo Books and
Music. Previously, she was president of Cott Corporation, a leading supplier of
private label carbonated soft drinks. [http://www.chapters.indigo.ca/Indigo-Books-Music-Inc-
Management/inc_mgmt-artRS.html Profile at indigo.ca] [http://www.facebook.com/pages/Heather-
Reisman/110378902345740 Profile at Facebook]
